radiographic_examinations.findings: Mild cortical atrophy, thin corpus callosum, and cerebellar vermis hypoplasia.
Marked reduction of b wave amplitude, especially of the rod response; less severe reduction of combined rod-cone and cone responses.
Posterior subcapsular cataract and tapetoretinal degeneration.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: One year after the first evaluation, worsening and enlargement of atrophic areas.
